LanguageData.WHE_ElvenBow.label: Elven bow
LanguageData.WHE_ElvenBow.description: It is a cheaper version of the common bow used by the ancient elves.
LanguageData.WHE_ElvenBow.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.AS_WHE_ElvenArrow.label: greatbow arrow
LanguageData.AS_AssaultRifle.label: AS Assault Rifle
LanguageData.AS_AssaultRifle.description: An assault rifle created by some ancient technology. It is fitted with a grip, which improves the accuracy and stability of the shot.
LanguageData.AS_SniperRifle.label: AS Assault Rifle Custom
LanguageData.AS_SniperRifle.description: A custom version of the AS assault rifle. It is fitted with a scope, making it specialized for shooting at longer distances.
LanguageData.AS_Shotgun.label: AS Assault Rifle Custom
LanguageData.AS_Shotgun.description: A shotgun created by an ancient technology.
